statement.p: In 14.63 of the last 41 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{41}}={0.1463}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{41}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1463}\cdot{41}={5.9983}. We round that as requested to 6 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
